notes about colors notions yarn needle stitch markers measuring tape scissors stitches and terms used bobble yarn over as if you were going to make a double_crochet insert your hook into the space yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through the first 2 loops repeat from beginning four more times in the same space you ll have 6 loops on the hook yarn over one last time and pull through all loops chain 1 to close chain chain double_crochet double_crochet puff yarn over insert hook into the stitch yarn over pull up a loop yarn over insert hook in same stitch yarn over pull up a loop 3 times there will be 9 loops on hook yarn over and draw through all loops on hook chain 1 to close space space st s stitch es treble_crochet treble_crochet pattern notes square is made in 4 colors but can be made in as few as 2 feel free to experiment with your yarn choices 2 skull granny square www hodgepodge_crochet com instructions round 1 in magic_ring with white yarn chain 2 does not count as st 7 treble_crochet chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet chain 3 treble_crochet pull ring to tighten join with a slip_stitch to beginning treble_crochet 10 sts round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in join single_crochet in next 6 treble_crochet 4 single_crochet in chain-3 space 4 double_crochet in chain-2 space note place marker in 1st double_crochet before moving on 4 single_crochet in chain-3 space single_crochet in last treble_crochet join with a slip_stitch to beginning single_crochet note place marker in join for ease in finding st after weaving tail finish off and weave tails 20 sts round 3 with green yarn join with a slip_stitch to previous join and remove marker chain 1 puff in join puff in each st around to 1st marked double_crochet skip double_crochet
